messages.message:
Hi team, i've just been chatting this through with @Anant so wanted to raise it here...

many customers are asking... if they already have their own Azure VPC, can we support them using their own private endpoints for GPT and ADA within Azure?
How much effort would it be to officially support this?
What is the process for getting this added to the backlog and prioritised?

As an example, here is how MunichRe would currently like to deploy Instabase. We will try everything to change their mind and push them to SaaS plus an Azure Endpoint endpoint managed by us.
Yet, the request has come up about 5 times in the last 2 weeks alone which underlines the relevance of the topic.
